class polls.models.Question(id, question_text, pub_date)¶

Базовые классы: Model

Параметры:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • question_text (CharField) – Question text

  • pub_date (DateTimeField) – Date published

Reverse relationships:

Параметры:

choice (Reverse ForeignKey from Choice) – All choices of this question (related name of question)

Type: CharField

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this

Type: DateTimeField

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this

__init__(attr1, attr2)¶

Конструктор класса. Args: attr1 (str): Описание атрибута. attr2 (int): Описание атрибута.

method1(param1, param2)¶

Описание метода. Args: param1 (int): Описание параметра. param2 (str): Описание параметра. Returns: str: Описание возвращаемого значения. Raises: ValueError: Если параметр param1 меньше 0.

choice_set¶

Type: Reverse ForeignKey from Choice

All choices of this question (related name of question)

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

class polls.models.Virtuals(id, hostname, protocol, user_id, address, port, user_vm, password_vm, ignore_cert)¶

Базовые классы: Model

Параметры:

  • id (UUIDField) – Primary key: Id

  • hostname (CharField) – Hostname

  • protocol (CharField) – Protocol

  • address (CharField) – Address

  • port (IntegerField) – Port

  • user_vm (CharField) – User vm

  • password_vm (CharField) – Password vm

  • ignore_cert (BooleanField) – Ignore cert

Relationship fields:

Параметры:

user_id (ForeignKey to User) – User id (related name: virtuals)

Reverse relationships:

Параметры:

audit_log (Reverse ForeignKey from Audit_log) – All audit_logs of this virtuals (related name of virtual_id)
